item.title: The GOP's Message for Tech Billionaires: Be Like Peter Thiel
item.description: One lesson Republican insiders took away from Elon Musk's spectacular flameout? Be wary of billionaires who love the spotlight.

item.title: Trump’s AI Action Plan Is a Crusade Against ‘Bias’—and Regulation
item.description: The Trump administration’s new AI policy blueprint calls for limited regulation and lots of leeway for Big Tech to grow even bigger.

item.title: Super Pocket Neo Geo Edition Review: Pocketable Fun
item.description: Portable retro greatness, with great compromises.

item.title: Best Indoor Garden Systems (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Grow a backyard’s worth of greens and vegetables in your house with a vertical hydroponic garden. Here are a few that might be worth the investment.

item.title: A New Era for WIRED—That Starts With You
item.description: As of today, there are even more ways to enjoy WIRED’s journalism, including premium newsletters and livestream Q&As. Join us.
